FuncDef: This command configures the location ID for the for the route reflector. A BGP neighbor can be associated with a location if it is a route-reflector client.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an optimal-route-reflection location. Values-1 to 16.
Specifies the primary, secondary, or tertiary IP address. Values-primary ipv4-address, secondary ipv4-address, tertiary ipv4-address,.
